attributes.additional_details:
This is unfair on other countries which are on red list currently.

PM should not visit India as this is not sending a positive message and he is not practicing what he is preaching.

India has reported 200000 new covid cases yesterday 17th April 2021.

U.K should put India on Red List after all the hard work of vaccine roll out in U.K.

U.K is being discrimnative towards other countries who are currently on red list, this is unfair in my view.
attributes.background: To put India on red list travel country as it has 74 new variant with 2 mutations, all because india is not on red list.
